document.full_text: australia intends to reject singapore exchange ltd's  proposed $7.8 billion bid for australia's asx ltd  on national interest grounds, underscoring the political challenges facing other cross-border exchange deals.
document.title: australia to reject singapore exchange's $7.8 billion asx bid
lines_and_colors: australia intends to reject singapore exchange ltd's  proposed $7.8 billion bid for australia's asx ltd  on national interest grounds, underscoring the political challenges facing other cross-border exchange deals.
